metadata.title: USN-3670-1 -- elfutils vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Agostino Sarubbo discovered that elfutils incorrectly handled certain malformed ELF files. If a user or automated system were tricked into processing a specially crafted ELF file, elfutils could be made to crash or consume resources, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3670-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libasm1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3 libdw-dev - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3 libelf1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3 libelf-dev - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3 elfutils - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3 libdw1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3 libasm-dev - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3 No subscription required
